headline: What Makes Seagate Technology Holdings (STX) a Favorite Stock for Billionaire Stanley Druckenmiller?
summary: We recently published a list of Billionaire Stanley Druckenmiller’s Top 10 Stock Picks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Seagate Technology Holdings plc (NASDAQ:STX) stands against other stock picks of Billionaire Stanley Druckenmiller.
